activities: Aha! offers a Software as Service based product management platform to its customers, including customers from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland. The platform enables Aha! customers to store business information. Customers may include personal information within the data transferred on the Aha! platform, however this is not the purpose of the platform or its intended use. Aha! does not control or supervise the data inserted on its platform by its customers or their customers. Aha! only interacts with such data by transferring and storing it in digital format, irrespective of content value or sensitivity.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online data collected through customer Sign-up, or as may be collected online by Aha's customers, and placed on Aha's platform. Aha! does not process any data manually.
recoursemech: EU and/or Swiss data protection authorities
